body: This was an idea that Para (I think)  had a while ago. To mix CTH and Nexus but I wanted to know if the idea of having some CTH maps like the The Fall and Magma put into Nexus as a CTH round or TDM if this is possible it would be cool to play. Opinions?
body_tagged: This was an idea that Para (I think)  had a while ago. To mix CTH and Nexus but I wanted to know if the idea of having some CTH maps like the The Fall and Magma put into Nexus as a CTH round or TDM if this is possible it would be cool to play. Opinions?
title: (Sug) Have some CTH/Nexus matches

replies.body: Well I want my CTH levels back if this happens. But CTH maps in Nexus would be cool.
replies.body_tagged: Well I want my CTH levels back if this happens. But CTH maps in Nexus would be cool.

replies.body: I don't mean mix the stats in the gamemode I mean have the fall in a rot of Nexus as a TDM match.
replies.body_tagged: I don't mean mix the stats in the gamemode I mean have the fall in a rot of Nexus as a TDM match.

replies.body: Yeah well if we trasnfer the maps, CtH is probably going to be removed as well.
